member.name: T:DryIocAttributes.ReuseAttribute
member.summary: Base attribute to specify type of reuse for annotated class.

member.summary: Implementation of reuse. Could be null to specify transient or no reuse.

member.summary: Optional name, valid only for Current Scope Reuse.

member.summary: Create attribute with specified type implementing reuse.
member.param: (optional) Name is valid only for Current Scope Reuse and will be ignored by the rest of reuse types.

member.summary: Denotes exported type with Singleton reuse.

member.name: T:DryIocAttributes.WebRequestReuseAttribute
member.summary: Marks exported type with Reuse.InWebRequest. Basically it is CurrentScopeReuse with predefined name Reuse.WebRequestScopeName.

member.summary: Default web reuse scope name. Just a convention supported by DryIoc.

member.summary: Creates attribute.

member.name: T:DryIocAttributes.ThreadReuseAttribute
member.summary: Marks exported type with Reuse.InThread. Basically it is CurrentScopeReuse with predefined name ThreadScopeContext.ScopeContextName.

member.name: F:DryIocAttributes.ThreadReuseAttribute.ScopeContextName
member.summary: Name for root scope in thread context. Just a convention supported by DryIoc.

member.summary: Simplified version of Push with most common properties.

member.summary: Returns true if request info and passed object are equal, and their parents recursively are equal.

member.summary: Compares infos regarding properies but not their parents.
